-  bridgedAccessories 

Instance Property# bridgedAccessories

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
var bridgedAccessories: [HMAccessory] { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessory/bridgedAccessories#discussion)

If the receiver represents a bridge, an array of the accessories behind the bridge, otherwise empty.
